subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer will for the first time suspend all of its games during the opening group stage of the World Cup next year, the league said. The group phase, which is set to begin June 11, features 48 of the 64 games in the World Cup. M.L.S. said its final game before the World Cup would be played June 10, with the break continuing through at least June 25, when the final game of the group stage is scheduled. ¶Two days after his two-game ban was overturned, Eduardo da Silva scored the winner as Arsenal rallied to win Wednesday at Standard Liège, 3-2, in the Champions League. Arsenal trailed by two after only five minutes. champions (AP).
